title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Dive into More Dispatch Work
content:
Vincent needs help keeping the streets of Los Santos in check with new Dispatch Work: go solo and fight the good fight by rescuing an informant being held hostage and dealing with violent drug dealers.

Completing each one will reward you with GTA$ and RP, so grab a law enforcement vehicle from Warstock Cache & Carry and launch Dispatch Work while inside.
